entities.name: fudge
entities.description: Fudge is mentioned as someone who confirms that Black betrayed the Potters. He says 'He did' when asked if Black betrayed them.

entities.name: madam rosmerta
entities.description: Madam Rosmerta is shocked and asks if Black betrayed the Potters.

entities.name: black
entities.description: Black is mentioned as a double-agent who betrayed the Potters. He wanted to declare his support for You-Know-Who openly.

entities.name: you-know-who
entities.description: You-Know-Who is mentioned as Black's master and the one he was supporting.

entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: Harry Potter is mentioned as the reason for You-Know-Who's downfall.

entities.name: potters
entities.description: The Potters are mentioned as the ones who were betrayed by Black.

entities.name: hagrid
entities.description: Hagrid is angry and calls Black a 'Filthy, stinkin' turncoat!'

entities.name: professor mcgonagall
entities.description: Professor McGonagall asks Hagrid to be quiet.

entities.name: fidelius charm
entities.description: The Fidelius Charm is mentioned as a spell that was performed.

relationships.description: Hagrid met Black before he killed the Potters.
